"He listened to our ideas and helped us create a design that we absolutely loved." "At 933am I received a response that my appointment was cancelled completely." "The service and timing has been wonderful."

Wish we could give a negative -1 score.  Multiple issues with the builder.   All work is contracted out and very little support. Constantly missing promises to be onsite for review which resulted in a major repair and then a repair of a … More Response from the owner a month ago This isn’t the first time—or the last time—a plumbing line has been damaged during pool construction. It’s part of the process, and when it happened, we took … More

As first-time pool builders, we had a lot of questions and concerns, but our experience with Tidal Wave Custom Pools was exceptional from start to finish. … More Response from the owner a year ago Thank you so much for the great review! I am so glad we had the opportunity to be your builder. The project turned out amazing and we will be putting Pictures of this project online to show everybody!!! Thank you again guys. Y’all were absolutely great to work for.!

I LOVE MY POOL!! Tidal Wave Custom Pools made our dream of a backyard oasis come true! They took our ideas and made them even better. JR designed & brought to life a beautiful and functional space for all of our family & friends to enjoy. … More Response from the owner a year ago Your project turned out amazing guys! We absolutely loved building for you and your family. I hope y’all enjoy this for years to come. Thank you so much for the high praise!
